column1: Art Institute of Chicago////I have been going to Chicago's Art Institute for decades
column2: and it never fails to disappoint. I have been to art museums all over the country
column3: as well as in several European cities (Paris
column4: notably) and still feel that this is a standout museum on so many levels--the magnificence and variety of its collections
column6: the sheer impact of the building and it's setting. I love being there.
